chunk_responses.content: An animated astronaut is shown on the moon. A man is shown in a kitchen.
A man is talking to the camera, then a woman is eating noodles, and then a man is talking to the camera.
A man is eating a bowl of food and then a man is talking about food.
A man in a yellow shirt talks to the camera, then a question mark appears.
A man is talking about a product and then shows a picture of the product.
A man is talking about a food product and then three men are shown at a table.
A man is shown eating a bowl of ramen noodles with a raw egg on top.
A man is talking about a noodle dish and how to make it.
A man is eating noodles with chopsticks while a woman is drinking a can of soda.
A woman is sitting at a table and is eating a drink.
Three men are sitting at a table with a screen behind them.
A man is talking about food and a woman is talking about food.
A man is cooking bacon wrapped around a stick in a pan.
A woman is shown making bacon wrapped cheese sticks and then eating them.
A woman is talking to the camera, then two men are talking to the camera.
A man is talking about a food item and then a picture of the food item is shown.
A man is talking about a cake and then a woman is shown holding a cupcake.
Three men are sitting at a table with a screen behind them.
A man is talking about a product and then a man is shown holding a product.
A man is shown stirring a mixture in a cup with a spoon.
A man is talking about a product and then shows a mug with a picture of a man on it.
A man in a white shirt talks to the camera, a woman applies lipstick, a spoon stirs a cup of hot chocolate, and a man talks to the camera again.
A man is talking about a food item and then shows the food item.
A man is shown pouring milk into a muffin tin and then taking out the muffins.
A man is talking to a woman in a white shirt.
A woman is eating a cookie while looking at her phone.
Three men are sitting at a table with a screen behind them.
A man is shown pouring milk over a tray of cookies.
A man is talking about a food item and then shows it being prepared.
A man is talking about a food item and then three men are sitting at a table.
A man in a white shirt is talking to the camera.
A man is talking about a snack and then shows how to make it.
A man is talking about a food item and then he is shown eating it.
A woman is shown eating a cookie and then a man is shown eating a cookie.
